price: Ohun tí ó ṣẹlẹ̀ si yín ní ọjọ́ tí ikọ̀ ogun méjèèjì pàdé, (ó ṣẹlẹ̀) pẹ̀lú ìyọ̀ǹda Allāhu. Àti pé nítorí kí Ó lè ṣàfi hàn àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo ni.
arabic: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā aṣābakum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyaʿlama al-mu'minīna
